markdownRemark.html:
Here’s a neat technique I learned while building The Nature of the Beast, and was able to whip out during a code interview.

The interviewer asked me to take an array of numbers, e.g. [1,4,10] and print them out in order with one second delay between them.

In NotB, descriptions are read out loud using the browser speech synthesis API. The starting
